PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-12772010-10-21,  IA&ND,  ,  , 
ActTerritorial Lands Act
SubjectBHP Billiton Diamonds Inc. Diavik Diamond Mines Inc. DeBeers Canada Inc. ** Leasing of Territorial Lands ** 31.25 ha at Dome Lake, Lockhart Lake and Lac de Gras
PrecisOrder approving the LEASING of approximately 31.25 hectares of land located at Dome Lake, Lockhart Lake and Lac de Gras in the Northwest Territories, to BHP BILLITON DIAMONDS INC., DIAVIK DIAMOND MINES INC. and DeBEERS CANADA INC. to facilitate the operation of winter road maintenance camps in support of the Tibbitt to Contwoyto Lake winter road.
AttachmentsAttachment
